original_text: part of a cake of pressed figs and two cakes of raisins. He ate and was revived, for he had not eaten any food or drunk any water for three days and three nights.
korean_text: 그에게 무화과 뭉치에서 뗀 덩이 하나와 건포도 두 송이를 주었으니 그가 밤낮 사흘 동안 떡도 먹지 못하였고 물도 마시지 못하였음이니라 그가 먹고 정신을 차리매

sentences.original_text: part of a cake of pressed figs
for he had not eaten any food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 음식도 먹지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: for three days and three nights
